title: Plywood, MDF & HDHMR
subtitle: High-quality boards for all your construction needs
description: Premium plywood, MDF, and HDHMR boards from trusted manufacturers. Available in various grades and thicknesses for interior and exterior applications.

title: Fevicol Adhesives
subtitle: Strong and reliable adhesives for every application
description: Complete range of Fevicol adhesives including synthetic resin, heatproof, waterproof, and special adhesives for PVC sheets. Trusted by professionals.

title: Kitchen Systems & Accessories
subtitle: Modern solutions for efficient and stylish kitchens
description: Premium kitchen hardware including drawer systems, pull-outs, waste bins, and organizational accessories. Transform your kitchen with quality fittings.

title: Hinges, Channels & Handles
subtitle: Durable and aesthetic hardware for furniture and doors
description: Wide selection of hinges, drawer channels, and handles from leading brands like Hettich and Ebco. Soft-close mechanisms and premium finishes available.

title: Wardrobe & Bed Fittings
subtitle: Essential fittings for robust and functional wardrobes and beds
description: Complete range of wardrobe and bed fittings including hydraulic lifts, sliding mechanisms, rails, and accessories. Professional-grade hardware.

title: Door Locks & Hardware
subtitle: Secure and stylish locks and hardware for all types of doors
description: Premium door locks from Europa and Godrej. Mortise locks, cylindrical locks, door closers, and complete door hardware solutions.

title: General Hardware & Tools
subtitle: A wide range of general hardware and essential tools
description: Essential hardware and tools for every project. Fasteners, adhesives, measurement tools, and safety equipment from trusted brands.

title: Aluminium Door Calculator
subtitle: Smart price calculator for aluminium doors
description: Calculate accurate pricing for aluminium doors with chaukhat, ready for wet areas. Configure dimensions, thickness, and add-ons.

title: Window Calculator
subtitle: 2 Track and 3 Track window pricing calculator
description: Calculate pricing for 2-track and 3-track windows with area-based rates and premium glass options. Configure dimensions and add-ons.
